my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Tuah, sudah lama kita berjalan. Alif juga rasa haus teramat!

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Saya nampak ada sesuatu disebalik rumput tersebut. Mari kita melihat apa itu!

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Wah! nasib kita amatlah baik, Tuah! Segelas air di sebalik rumput tersebut.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: @user, kami perlukan bantuan anda untuk mengambil gelas air itu.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Yeay! Hilang rasa haus! Huruf Hijaiyah pertama harini telah dijumpai!

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Tuah, we've been walking for a while.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: I think I see something ahead in the grass.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Is that a jug of lemonade?

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: @user, can you please help pass that jug of lemonade?

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: And with that, we have also found...

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: ...the first Hijaiyah letter for this path!

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Yep, the jug of lemonade looks like the letter, `Jim`

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Alright, let us continue on this path.
